description:
When users first open the app with no tasks, display an interactive tutorial overlay that highlights key features: how to create tasks, move them between columns, and customize their board. Include a 'Take Tour' button and 'Skip' option.

**Rationale:** New users often abandon tools when faced with a blank canvas. A guided tour reduces time-to-value and increases activation rates by showing users exactly what the tool can do.
title: Interactive Empty Board Onboarding
